title: Cop shot dead by cop
text:
Cop shot dead by cop By Ed Amoroso   
CAMP VICENTE LIM, Laguna, Philippines – The chief of a police community precinct in Lipa City, Batangas was shot dead by a junior police officer in what authorities described as a case of miscommunication last Friday. 
Senior Police Officer 1 Darwin Rumal was declared dead on arrival at the Medix Medical Center due to gunshot wounds in the head and neck. 
Responding police officers arrested their colleague, Police Officer 2 Adriel Pasahol of the Tanauan City police special weapon and tactic squad. 
City police chief Superintendent Carlos Barde said Rumal and his family were on a motorcycle when he spotted Pasahol dri-ving a similar vehicle in Barangay Sabang at around 8:30 p.m. 
Pasahol said Rumal pulled over beside him and allegedly poked a gun at his face, prompting him to shoot the officer. 
Investigators said they have yet to get the side of Rumal’s family on the incident.
